mapper.select: select p.app_person_id ,p.type ,p.name ,p.id_number,t.type_id,type_desc , p.postcode_address ,p.other_information ,u.user_id, u.username from common_app_person p join app_person_types t on p.type=t.type_id join user_app_person up on p.app_person_id = up.app_person join users u on u.user_id = up.user where up.user=#{userId}
